sourceMeaningMnemonic: When <radical>dirt</radical> and <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>suit</radical> one another, the flowers grow so tall that they make a <kanji>tower</kanji>! A flower tower made of flower power!
meaningInfo: Imagine walking in the woods and coming across a huge tower made of flowers. It goes so high you can hardly see the top.
readingMnemonic: The only place flowers grow into <kanji>tower</kanji>s like this is in <ja><reading>とう</reading>きょう</ja>. <ja>とうきょう</ja> dirt is the best. <ja>とうきょう</ja> flowers are the best. Thus, you end up with a lot of <ja>とうきょう</ja> towers.
readingInfo: How do you think the <ja>とうきょう</ja> tower came to be, anyway? It was once a big flower tower. They just replaced it with metal later. BOOM! History bomb, you're welcome.
